welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Bernardino, a city known for its rich history, beautiful landscapes, and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your time here and explore all that this charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Restaurante San Pablo
restaurants.description: Restaurante San Pablo is a restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Restaurante Mar & Tierra
restaurants.description: Restaurante Mar & Tierra is a restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Pollo Campero Plaza las Americas
restaurants.description: Pollo Campero Plaza las Americas is a fried chicken joint located in the city.

restaurants.name: Taco Bell
restaurants.description: Taco Bell is a taco restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Restaurante Don Carlos
restaurants.description: Restaurante Don Carlos is a restaurant located in Mazatenango.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norton AFB Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Norton AFB Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport, handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. No password is required.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ontario International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ontario International Airport, primarily serving regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: No password required, but may require accepting terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport serves commercial flights to various destinations in the United States.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Cable Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southern California Logistics Airport serves both commercial and cargo flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Southern California Logistics Airport handles all cargo operations, including freight and logistics services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
